typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as short,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Movies
Movies derive(Year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()')),
		title = toString(left(title, length(title) -6))) ~> ColunaDerivada1
ColunaDerivada1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movies-clean.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MoviesClean
